pkgmetadata.longdescription: Noisy Stochastic Block Model for GGM Inference // Greedy Bayesian algorithm to fit the noisy stochastic block model to an observed sparse graph. Moreover, a graph inference procedure to recover Gaussian Graphical Model (GGM) from real data. This procedure comes with a control of the false discovery rate. The method is described in the article "Enhancing the Power of Gaussian Graphical Model Inference by Modeling the Graph Structure" by Kilian, Rebafka, and Villers (2024) arXiv:2402.19021.
